title: Wearing Clothes Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Wearing Clothes Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Wearing Clothes Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 5
items.arabic: (الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ الَّذِي كَسَانِي هَذَا (الثَّوْبَ) وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلاَ قُوَّة...)
items.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee kasanee hatha (aththawb) warazaqaneehi min ghayri hawlin minnee wala quwwah.
items.translation: All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power nor might from myself.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء الملابس
